snippet: AOL reported its best quarterly revenue growth in eight years because of strong search and advertising sales.
abstract: AOL reports its first quarterly revenue growth in eight years on strong search and advertising sales; total revenue rose 4 percent, to nearly $600 million, in the fourth quarter.
lead_paragraph: AOL reported its best quarterly revenue growth in eight years because of strong search and advertising sales.

headline.main: AOL Profit Rises on Strong Ad Sales
headline.print_headline: AOL Reports First Quarterly Growth in 8 Years
